entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `JsonPropertyInfo.AttributeProvider` is null when using `JsonSerializerContext` #96387
  • Expression.Compile(preferInterpretation: true) invokes inner lambda when a method is called on it #96385
  • Using Raylib APIs in Blazor WebAssembly #96384
  • Vector128 invalid code generation with tiered compilation in Release #96381
    8.0.x
  • [ARM64] `CINC` or at least `CSEL` not emitted for conditional increment #96380

Closed

  • VB.NET cannot AOT compile into DLL. I hope to add exported DLL dynamic library and ACTIVEX DLL. #96379
  • CG2-specific failure in JIT/Intrinsics/TypeIntrinsics_r.csproj and TypeIntrinsics_ro.csproj #96336
    9.0.0
  • Enable versioning bubbles that span multiple assemblies #10477
    Future
  • StackTracePreserveTests test fails #11213
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #96388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Experiment: Minopts lsra #96386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix copy&paste bug in ReadyToRun_TypeGenericInfoMap::HasConstraints #96358
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr
  • Update official windows queue to vs preview to match public #94887
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Set `bbFalseTarget` upon `BBJ_COND` initialization/modification #96265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Allow preinitializing `AppContext.TryGetSwitch` #95948
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't rely on inlining observations if VM doesn't allow that #96373
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement remaining ILGenertorImpl methods, excluding scope. Add max stack calculation for branching. #96362
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
